jd: From: Adeeb, CCITINC adeebk@ccitinc.com Reply to: adeebk@ccitinc.com Technical Lead (C#)- Developer Atlanta GA onsite 6 months Contract to hire Fortna Job Requirements 7-10 years experience in developing software solutions using C# programming language. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of object-oriented programming principles and be proficient in using .NET framework. Knowledge in TCP messaging, server/client protocol is required. Travel to end customer site for commissioning is expected as part of this role. Upto 20% of time expected for customer site travel. In this role, you will be responsible for designing, coding, testing, and debugging software applications. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to analyze user requirements and translate them into functional software. Additionally, you will be involved in troubleshooting and resolving software defects and issues. The successful candidate should have excellent problem-solving skills and be able to work independently as well as in a team environment. Prior experience in the Warehouse Automation or Material Handling industry would be a plus. Join our team at Quest Global and contribute to the development of cutting-edge software solutions. Work Experience C# Development 7-10 years experience Knowledge in TCP messaging, server/client protocol needed. C#, .Net core rev3.x, MS SQL over Nhibernate, RabbitMQ Socket communication; TCP/IP messaging Good communication skills Experience in developing software solutions for the Warehouse Automation industry Strong understanding of industry standards and best practices Ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills Collaborative mindset and ability to work well in a team Passion for learning and staying updated with the latest technologies Attention to detail and ability to deliver high-quality work Ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines Experience with Agile development methodologies
